content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for considering my apartment. I'm confident that it will meet all of your needs. As a landlord, my primary goal is to maximize my gains, so please let's discuss the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. While I appreciate your willingness to pay, I believe that I can offer a higher rental price. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm looking for something closer to 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I can pay 750 Euros per month.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I see. Well, I appreciate your interest, but I'm afraid I cannot accept your offer of 750 Euros per month. As a landlord, I need to ensure that I'm getting the best possible deal for myself. I'm open to further negotiation, but I'm looking for something closer to 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
